Title: phpBB: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in phpBB, the worst of
    which may allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML.

Background.Text: phpBB is an Open Source bulletin board package.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in phpBB. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker may be able to change settings, inject arbitrary web script or HTML, or conduct cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
Gentoo Security support has been discontinued due to phpBB being dropped
      to unstable. As such, we recommend that users unmerge phpBB:

NOTE: Users could alternatively upgrade to
      “>=www-apps/phpBB-3.1.10”, however, these packages are not
      currently marked stable.
